game.title: TITTTTTTTTTTLLLLLLLLLLEEEEEEEEEE
game.description: you are standing outside and facing an erie house in the night.
game.question: Will you proceed and open door?
game.answer: yes, you are now in the main room of the house
no, are you dumb? who doesnt go in.. shame on you!
